snippet: Like many other areas of the administration, the State Department has many vacancies in its top ranks. As of the beginning of May, 16 of the department’s 59 top jobs were vacant or filled with men and women performing the duties in an “acting”...
lead_paragraph: Like many other areas of the administration, the State Department has many vacancies in its top ranks. As of the beginning of May, 16 of the department’s 59 top jobs were vacant or filled with men and women performing the duties in an “acting” capacity.

headline.seo: Empty Seats at the State Department
headline.main: Empty Seats at the State Department
